name: Global Uniques
uniques: Nullifies [Culture] [in all cities]
Each city founded increases Science cost of Technologies [100]% less than normal
Instantly gain [-1] [Golden Age points] <for every [Happiness]> <upon turn end>
Notified of new Barbarian encampments
[+1] Unit Supply <for every [Units]>
[-100]% maintenance costs
Triggers a [Cast Spell] event <upon turn start> <every [2] turns> <when above [20] [Mana]> <when above [0] [Concentration]>
Improves movement speed on roads
Roads connect tiles across rivers
Enables embarkation for land units
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles
Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
[{Zombie Slave} {Human}] units gain the [Dead Worker] promotion <upon turn end>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities]
Nullifies [Food] [in all cities] <in cities with at least [2] [Population]>
Population loss from nuclear attacks [-100]% [in all cities]
Damage to garrison from nuclear attacks [-100]% [in all cities]
[-100]% Yield from every [Demon Tech] <for [non-[Demonic]] Civilizations>
[-100]% Yield from every [non-[Demon Tech]] <for [Demonic] Civilizations>
[-15]% Strength <if [Wildmen's Curse] is constructed by anybody> <if [Wildmen's Curse] is not constructed> <hidden from users>
Remove [Curse] [in all cities] <upon turn end> <when below [1] [Curse Time]> <hidden from users>
Gain control over [1] tiles [in all cities] <upon turn end>
unitUniques: Free [Serf] appears <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <for [Undead] Civilizations>
Free [Serf] appears <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <for [Demonic] Civilizations>
Free [Den Builder] appears <upon entering a [Barbarian encampment] tile> <for [Wildmen] Civilizations> <for [non-[Den Builder]] units>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders
